analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x4583655912cd2bc084789599c9b6b320ece8a9b1.sol:
	Contract GayBananaToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x4583655912cd2bc084789599c9b6b320ece8a9b1.sol#253-254)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x4583655912cd2bc084789599c9b6b320ece8a9b1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/46/0x4583655912cd2bc084789599c9b6b320ece8a9b1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x4583655912cd2bc084789599c9b6b320ece8a9b1.sol#124) is not in mixedCase
